about_the_game:
Play through Yui's first summer out of college in this sweet otome visual novel where there is more to everyone than meets the eye.

FEATURES

* Over 20,000 words

* Flavor choices to engage in conversations in your way

* Customizable name for protagonist

* 2 completely different romance routes

* In game phone for texting love interests

* Soundtrack that has never been heard before!

STORY

A fresh graduate out of college, Yui is ready to take on the world with her best friend. When she moves to the city, all she wants is to explore her new life. When an incident leaves Yui stranded, she’s forced to rely on the only connections she has in the city, her online pen pal and…ex?

Follow your heart and help Yui untangle her career and personal life in this too sweet romance where the final decision is all yours.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any recent version
  • Processor: Any recent version
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any recent version
  • Processor: Any recent version
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: City Lights, Old Flames
